title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-3.2 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-3.2 - Definition

State Regulations

For purposes of this section, foster
youth
shall mean students who have qualified as an orphan, foster
child, or ward of the court for the purposes of Federal student financial aid
programs authorized by title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965, as
amended. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
152-3.2

Adopted

New

York State Register October 7, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 40, eff. 10/7/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
